long.name: RSI + MA + BB Long Strategy
long.description: Enters on RSI > 70 (15m) + SMA 50 > SMA 200 (1h), exits on BB%B < 0.1 (4h). Validated on 5 years of data.

short.name: RSI + MA + BB Short Strategy
short.description: Enters on RSI < 30 (15m) + SMA 50 < SMA 200 (1h), exits on BB%B > 0.9 (4h). Mirror strategy for bearish markets.
